text: “And you, bring near to you your brother Aaron and his sons with him from among the Israelites, so that they may minister as my priests—Aaron, Nadab and Abihu, Eleazar and Ithamar, Aaron’s sons.

You must <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">garments</st><n id="1" /> for your <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st>, for <st data-num="03519" class="">glory</st> and for <st data-num="08597" class="">beauty</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st><n id="1" /> are to <st data-num="01696" class="">speak</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> who are <st data-num="03820" class="">specially</st> <st data-num="02450" class="">skilled</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> I have <st data-num="04390" class="">filled</st> with the <st data-num="07307" class="">spirit</st> of <st data-num="02451" class="">wisdom</st>,<n id="3" /> so that they may <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st><n id="4" /> <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron’s</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">garments</st> to <st data-num="06942">set</st> him <st data-num="06942" class="">apart</st><n id="5" /> to <st data-num="03547">minister as</st> my <st data-num="03547" class="">priest</st>.

Now <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> are the <st data-num="0899" class="">garments</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> they are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st>: a <st data-num="02833" class="">breastpiece</st>,<n id="1" /> an <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st>,<n id="2" /> a <st data-num="04598" class="">robe</st>, a <st data-num="08665" class="">fitted</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="03801" class="">tunic</st>, a <st data-num="04701" class="">turban</st>, and a <st data-num="073" class="">sash</st>. They are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">garments</st> for your <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> and for his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, that they may <st data-num="03547">minister as</st> my <st data-num="03547" class="">priests</st>.
The artisans are to use the gold, blue, purple, scarlet, and fine linen.
“They are to make the ephod of gold, blue, purple, scarlet, and fine twisted linen, the work of an artistic designer.

It is to <st data-num="01961" class="">have</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="03802" class="">shoulder pieces</st> <st data-num="02266" class="">attached</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> of its <st data-num="07098" class="">corners</st>, so it can be <st data-num="02266" class="">joined together</st>.<n id="1" />
The artistically woven waistband of the ephod that is on it is to be like it, of one piece with the ephod, of gold, blue, purple, scarlet, and fine twisted linen.
“You are to take two onyx stones and engrave on them the names of the sons of Israel,

<st data-num="08337" class="">six</st><n id="1" /> of their <st data-num="08034" class="">names</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stone</st>, and the <st data-num="08337" class="">six</st> <st data-num="03498" class="">remaining</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">names</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stone</st>, according to the <st data-num="08435">order of</st> their <st data-num="08435" class="">birth</st>.<n id="2" />

You are to <st data-num="06605" class="">engrave</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="08034" class="">names</st> of the <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> with the <st data-num="04639" class="">work</st> of an <st data-num="02796" class="">engraver</st> in <st data-num="068" class="">stone</st>, like the <st data-num="06603" class="">engravings</st> of a <st data-num="02368" class=""> seal</st>;<n id="1" /> you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">have</st> them <st data-num="04142" class="">set</st><n id="2" /> in <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="04865" class="">filigree settings</st>.<n id="3" />
You are to put the two stones on the shoulders of the ephod, stones of memorial for the sons of Israel, and Aaron will bear their names before the Lord on his two shoulders for a memorial.
You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="04865" class="">filigree settings</st> of <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st>
and two braided chains of pure gold, like a cord, and attach the chains to the settings.

“You are to make a breastpiece for use in making decisions, the work of an artistic designer; you are to make it in the same fashion as the ephod; you are to make it of gold, blue, purple, scarlet, and fine twisted linen.

It is to <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="07251" class="">square</st><n id="1" /> when<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03717" class="">doubled</st>, <st data-num="02239" class="">nine inches</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="0753" class="">long</st> and <st data-num="02239" class="">nine inches</st> <st data-num="07341" class="">wide</st>.

You are to <st data-num="04390" class="">set</st> in it a <st data-num="04396" class="">setting</st> for <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st>, <st data-num="0702" class="">four</st> <st data-num="02905" class="">rows</st> of <st data-num="068" class="">stones</st>, a <st data-num="02905" class="">row</st> with a <st data-num="0124" class="">ruby</st>, a <st data-num="06357" class="">topaz</st>, and a <st data-num="01304" class="">beryl</st>—the <st data-num="0259" class="">first</st> <st data-num="02905" class="">row</st>;

and the <st data-num="08145" class="">second</st> <st data-num="02905" class="">row</st>, a <st data-num="05306" class="">turquoise</st>, a <st data-num="05601" class="">sapphire</st>, and an <st data-num="03095" class="">emerald</st>;

and the <st data-num="07992" class="">third</st> <st data-num="02905" class="">row</st>, a <st data-num="03958" class="">jacinth</st>, an <st data-num="07618" class="">agate</st>, and an <st data-num="0306" class="">amethyst</st>;

and the <st data-num="07243" class="">fourth</st> <st data-num="02905" class="">row</st>, a <st data-num="08658" class="">chrysolite</st>, an <st data-num="07718" class="">onyx</st>, and a <st data-num="03471" class="">jasper</st>.<n id="1" /> They are to <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="07660" class="">enclosed</st> in <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> in their <st data-num="04396" class="">filigree settings</st>.
The stones are to be for the names of the sons of Israel, twelve, according to the number of their names. Each name according to the twelve tribes is to be like the engravings of a seal.
“You are to make for the breastpiece braided chains like cords of pure gold,

and you are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="02833" class="">breastpiece</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">attach</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the upper<n id="2" /> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07098" class="">ends</st> of the <st data-num="02833" class="">breastpiece</st>.

You are to <st data-num="05414" class="">attach</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="05688" class="">chains</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="07098" class="">ends</st> of the <st data-num="02833" class="">breastpiece</st>;

the other<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07098" class="">ends</st> of the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="05688" class="">chains</st> you will <st data-num="05414" class="">attach</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="04865" class="">settings</st> and then <st data-num="05414" class="">attach</st> them<n id="2" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03802" class="">shoulder pieces</st> of the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="04136" class="">front</st> of <st data-num="06440" class="">it</st>.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> of <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> and <st data-num="07760" class="">put</st> <st data-num="0853" class="">them</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the other<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="07098" class="">ends</st> of the <st data-num="02833" class="">breastpiece</st>, <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> its <st data-num="08193" class="">edge</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> is <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">inner</st> <st data-num="05676" class="">side</st> of the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st>.

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> more<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">attach</st> them <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="04295" class="">bottom</st> of the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="03802" class="">shoulder pieces</st> on the <st data-num="04136 06440">front</st> of the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st>, <st data-num="05980" class="">close</st> to the <st data-num="04225" class="">juncture</st> <st data-num="04605" class="">above</st> the <st data-num="02805" class="">waistband</st> of the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st>.

They are to <st data-num="07405" class="">tie</st> the <st data-num="02833" class="">breastpiece</st> by its <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="02885" class="">rings</st> of the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st> by <st data-num="08504" class="">blue</st> <st data-num="06616" class="">cord</st>, so that it may <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">above</st> the <st data-num="02805" class="">waistband</st> of the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st>, and so that the <st data-num="02833" class="">breastpiece</st> will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02118" class="">be loose</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="0646" class="">ephod</st>.
Aaron will bear the names of the sons of Israel in the breastpiece of decision over his heart when he goes into the Holy Place, for a memorial before the Lord continually.

“You are to put the Urim and the Thummim into the breastpiece of decision; and they are to be over Aaron’s heart when he goes in before the Lord. Aaron is to bear the decisions of the Israelites over his heart before the Lord continually.
“You are to make the robe of the ephod completely blue.

There is to <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> an <st data-num="06310" class="">opening</st><n id="1" /> in its <st data-num="07218" class="">top</st><n id="2" /> in the <st data-num="08432" class="">center</st> of it, with an <st data-num="08193" class="">edge</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all around</st> the <st data-num="06310" class="">opening</st>, the <st data-num="04639" class="">work</st> of a <st data-num="0707" class="">weaver</st>,<n id="3" /> like the <st data-num="06310" class="">opening</st> of a <st data-num="08473" class="">collar</st>,<n id="4" /> so that it <st data-num="03808" class="">cannot</st> be <st data-num="07167" class="">torn</st>.<n id="5" />

You are to <st data-num="06213" class="">make</st> <st data-num="07416" class="">pomegranates</st><n id="1" /> of <st data-num="08504" class="">blue</st>, <st data-num="0713" class="">purple</st>, and <st data-num="08438 08144" class="">scarlet</st> <st data-num="05439" class="">all around</st> its <st data-num="07757" class="">hem</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="06472" class="">bells</st> of <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="08432" class="">between</st> them <st data-num="05439" class="">all around</st>.

The pattern is to be<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="06472" class="">bell</st> and a <st data-num="07416" class="">pomegranate</st>, a <st data-num="02091" class="">gold</st> <st data-num="06472" class="">bell</st> and a <st data-num="07416" class="">pomegranate</st>, <st data-num="05439" class="">all around</st> the <st data-num="07757" class="">hem</st> of the <st data-num="04598" class="">robe</st>.
The robe is to be on Aaron as he ministers, and his sound will be heard when he enters the Holy Place before the Lord and when he leaves, so that he does not die.
“You are to make a plate of pure gold and engrave on it the way a seal is engraved: ‘Holiness to the Lord.’

You are to <st data-num="07760" class="">attach</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> it a <st data-num="08504" class="">blue</st> <st data-num="06616" class="">cord</st> so that it will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="04701" class="">turban</st>; it is to <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="04136 06440" class="">front of</st> the <st data-num="04701" class="">turban</st>.

It will be on Aaron’s forehead, and Aaron will bear the iniquity of the holy things, which the Israelites are to sanctify by all their holy gifts; it will always be on his forehead, for their acceptance before the Lord.
You are to weave the tunic of fine linen and make the turban of fine linen, and make the sash the work of an embroiderer.
“For Aaron’s sons you are to make tunics, sashes, and headbands for glory and for beauty.
“You are to clothe them—your brother Aaron and his sons with him—and anoint them and ordain them and set them apart as holy, so that they may minister as my priests.

<st data-num="06213" class="">Make</st> for them <st data-num="0906" class="">linen</st> <st data-num="04370" class="">undergarments</st> to <st data-num="03680" class="">cover</st> their <st data-num="06172" class="">naked</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">bodies</st>;<n id="1" /> they must <st data-num="01961" class="">cover</st><n id="2" /> from the <st data-num="04975" class="">waist</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03409" class="">thighs</st>.

These must be on Aaron and his sons when they enter the tent of meeting, or when they approach the altar to minister in the Holy Place, so that they bear no iniquity and die. It is to be a perpetual ordinance for him and for his descendants after him.
